member.name: T:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.AssetController
member.summary: Handles the campaign assets.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.AssetController.Post(CMS.WebAnalytics.CampaignAssetViewModel)
member.summary: Performs saving of the corresponding to the given . The is inserted with the values obtained from .
member.param: Instance of updated view-model. This instance will be used to creating corresponding

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.AssetController.Put(CMS.WebAnalytics.CampaignAssetViewModel)
member.summary: Performs update of the corresponding. The values are updated with the values from .
member.remarks: No dirty checking is performed, will be updated even if no change was made to the object. HTTP verb PUT is not supported, therefore this request accepts only the POST requests.
member.param: Instance of updated view-model. This instance will be used to update corresponding
member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad request, if model state of binded was not valid otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with updated .

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.AssetController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes given campaign asset.
member.remarks: When response is returned, there will be no campaign with given ID in database. HTTP verb DELETE is not supported, therefore this request accepts only the GET requests.
member.returns: Returns HTTP status code 200 OK if request was successful.

member.name: T:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignController
member.summary: Handles getting of campaigns.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignController.Get
member.summary: Gets list of campaigns from the current site.

member.param: Instance of updated view-model. This instance will be used to create corresponding

member.summary: Performs update of the corresponding to the given property. The values are updated with the values from .
member.remarks: No dirty checking is performed, will be updated even if no change was made to the object. HTTP verb PUT is not supported, therefore this request accepts only the POST requests.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes campaign with given id only for current site.
member.remarks: When response is returned, there will be no campaign with given ID in database. HTTP verb DELETE is not supported, therefore this request accepts only the GET requests.

member.name: T:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionController
member.summary: Handles the campaign conversions.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionController.Post(CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionViewModel)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the corresponding to the given . The is inserted into database with the values obtained from .
member.remarks: If conversion with the same name and activity already exists within campaign, no action is performed and exiting conversion is returned.
member.param: Instance of view model with conversion information. This instance will be used to create corresponding
member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad Request, if model state of bound is not valid; otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with serialized .

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionController.Put(CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionViewModel)
member.summary: Updates existing instance of the corresponding to the given . The is updated in database with the values obtained from .
member.remarks: If conversion with the same name and activity already exists within campaign, no action is performed and original unchanged conversion is returned.
member.param: Instance of view model with conversion information. This instance will be used to update corresponding
member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad Request, if model state of bound is not valid; otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with serialized .

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the given campaign conversion.
member.remarks: When response is returned, there will be no conversion with given ID in the database. HTTP verb DELETE is not supported, therefore this request accepts only GET requests.
member.returns: Returns HTTP status code 200 OK if request is successful.

member.name: T:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionItemController
member.summary: Provides conversion items for Smart Drop-down in campaign conversions. Controller handles selected site-specific object types and checks read permissions.

member.summary: Gets object according to and it's .
member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad Request, if object is not found or insufficient permissions; otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with serialized view model.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionItemController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets collection of items on the current site. User must have read permission for given .
member.param: Search query (part of items's display name).
Index of the page. Pages are indexed from 0 (first page).
Number of results in the page.
member.returns: Collection of 10 serialized view models or HTTP status code 400 Bad Request if is not supported or insufficient permissions.

member.name: T:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionPageController
member.summary: Supplies data for page Smart Drop-down in campaign conversions.

member.summary: Gets page according to and .

member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad Request, if page is not found; otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with serialized view model.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionPageController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets list of pages for current site, where current user has read permission.
member.param: Index of the page. Pages are indexed from 0 (first page).
Number of results in the page.
member.returns: List of 10 serialized view models.
